wdkModel.name: toyFedModel
wdkModel.displayName: GUS Web Development Kit Federation Demo
wdkModel.introduction: Welcome to WDKToySite, a sample website driven by the GUS Web Development Kit. You are invited to explore this site to find out about the core functionalities of WDK. Enjoy the surfing!

question.name: ByNumSeqs
question.displayName: Find RNAs by number of assembly sequences
question.description: Find RNAs from a given organism that contain more than a specified number of ESTs in their assembly.

question.name: ByDbESTLib
question.displayName: Find RNAs by number of EST libs
question.description: Find RNAs with required assembly consistency score that contain ESTs from more than a specified number of libraries.

question.name: ByEstLib
question.description: Find ESTs from a given library

question.name: EstNullAttributes
question.displayName: Question that will return some controversial ESTs!
question.description: Question that will return ESTs, some of which have null values for their atttributes

question.name: RNA
question.description: Question that returns the RNA that belongs to the given EST; for use in a Nested Record

question.name: ESTs
question.description: Question that returns ESTs that belong to the given RNA; for use in a Nested Record List

sqlQuery.name: ByNumSeqs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select distinct a.na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a where a.number_of_contained_sequences > $$NumSeqs$$ and a.taxon_id in ($$ApiTaxon$$) ) UNION ( select distinct a.na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a where a.number_of_contained_sequences > $$NumSeqs$$ and a.taxon_id in ($$ApiTaxon$$) )

sqlQuery.name: ByDbESTLib
sqlQuery.sql: ( select distinct aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id as na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ est, WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_A@ lib, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_A@ aseq, @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a where lib.library_id = est.library_id and est.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id is not NULL and a.assembly_consistency > $$AssemblyConsistency$$ group by aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id having count (distinct lib.dbest_id) >= $$NumEstLibs$$ ) UNION ( select distinct aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id as na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ est, WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_B@ lib, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_B@ aseq, @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a where lib.library_id = est.library_id and est.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id is not NULL and a.assembly_consistency > $$AssemblyConsistency$$ group by aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id having count (distinct lib.dbest_id) >= $$NumEstLibs$$ )

sqlQuery.name: EstParent
sqlQuery.sql: ( select a.na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_A@ aseq where aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id and aseq.na_sequence_id = $$na_sequence_id$$ ) UNION ( select a.na_sequence_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_B@ aseq where aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id and aseq.na_sequence_id = $$na_sequence_id$$ )

sqlQuery.name: ByEstLib
sqlQuery.sql: ( select distinct e.est_id, e.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ e where e.library_id in ($$EstLib$$) ) UNION ( select distinct e.est_id, e.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ e where e.library_id in ($$EstLib$$) )

sqlQuery.name: NullAttributeEsts
sqlQuery.sql: ( select e.est_id, e.row_project_id as project_id from WdkTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ e where e.est_id > 9644231 and e.est_id < 9669294 ) UNION ( select e.est_id, e.row_project_id as project_id from WdkTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ e where e.est_id > 9644231 and e.est_id < 9669294 )

sqlQuery.name: GeneAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select tn.name as taxon_name from @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_A@ tn where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id ) UNION ( select tn.name as taxon_name from @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_B@ tn where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id )

sqlQuery.name: AssemblyAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select a.assembly_consistency, a.contains_mrna, a.number_of_contained_sequences, a.sequence from @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_A@ tn where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = '$$primaryKey$$' AND a.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id ) UNION ALL ( select a.assembly_consistency, a.contains_mrna, a.number_of_contained_sequences, a.sequence from @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_B@ tn where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = '$$primaryKey$$' AND a.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id )

sqlQuery.name: ConstituentEsts
sqlQuery.sql: ( select aseq.na_sequence_id as est_id, 'DT.' || a.na_sequence_id as source_id, aseq.sequence_start, aseq.sequence_end, aseq.quality_start, aseq.quality_end from WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_A@ aseq, @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id ) UNION ( select aseq.na_sequence_id as est_id, 'DT.' || a.na_sequence_id as source_id, aseq.sequence_start, aseq.sequence_end, aseq.quality_start, aseq.quality_end from WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_B@ aseq, @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id )

sqlQuery.name: SimpleEstIds
sqlQuery.sql: ( select est.est_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_A@ aseq, @SCHEMA_A@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ est where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id AND est.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id ) UNION ( select est.est_id, a.row_project_id as project_id from WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_B@ aseq, @SCHEMA_B@WDKTestAssembly a, WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ est where a.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND a.na_sequence_id = aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id AND est.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id )

sqlQuery.name: EstAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select e.accession as source_id, e.na_sequence_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ e where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ ) UNION ( select e.accession as source_id, e.na_sequence_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ e where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ )

sqlQuery.name: NullAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select a.na_sequence_id as assembly_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ e, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_A@ aseq, @SCHEMA_A@WdkTestAssembly a where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND e.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id ) UNION ( select a.na_sequence_id as assembly_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ e, WDKTestAssemblySequence@DB_LINK_B@ aseq, @SCHEMA_B@WdkTestAssembly a where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND e.na_sequence_id = aseq.na_sequence_id and aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id )

sqlQuery.name: LibAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: ( select l.dbest_name, l.anatomy_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_A@ e, WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_A@ l where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND e.library_id = l.library_id ) UNION ( select l.dbest_name, l.anatomy_id from WDKTestEst@DB_LINK_B@ e, WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_B@ l where e.row_project_id = $$projectID$$ AND e.est_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND e.library_id = l.library_id )

sqlQuery.name: ApiTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: ( select distinct name as term, taxon_id as internal from WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_A@ where name in ('Neospora caninum', 'Plasmodium falciparum', 'Eimeria tenella', 'Plasmodium yoelii', 'Sarcocystis neurona', 'Toxoplasma gondii') ) UNION ( select distinct name as term, taxon_id as internal from WDKTestTaxonName@DB_LINK_B@ where name in ('Neospora caninum', 'Plasmodium falciparum', 'Eimeria tenella', 'Plasmodium yoelii', 'Sarcocystis neurona', 'Toxoplasma gondii') )

sqlQuery.name: EstLib
sqlQuery.sql: ( select distinct dbest_name as term, library_id as internal from WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_A@ ) UNION ( select distinct dbest_name as term, library_id as internal from WDKTestLibrary@DB_LINK_B@ )

sqlQuery.name: Project
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct name as term, project_id as internal from apicore.projectinfo

stringParam.name: na_sequence_id
stringParam.help: Only used in a nested record

flatVocabParam.name: Project
flatVocabParam.help: The information of each GUS instance
